subject: Automobile Racing
Monaco Grand Prix (Auto Race)
lead_paragraph: Although he finished second, the Brazilian Ayrton Senna put in a stunning performance at the 1984 Monaco Grand Prix in only the sixth race of his debut Formula One season.
snippet: Although he finished second, the Brazilian Ayrton Senna put in a stunning performance at the 1984 Monaco Grand Prix in only the sixth race of his debut Formula One season.
